modName: Lanterns of Skyrim Preset for Climates of Tamriel Lvl6 Night (with better flicker effect)
summary: This is Lanterns of Skyrim preset for Climates of Tamriel (lvl 6 nights). I also raised the intensity of the flicker effect so that it is more noticeable.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][u]Lanterns of Skyrim preset for Climates of Tamriel lvl 6 nights
[/u][/size][/font]
This is my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916/?]Lanterns of Skyrim[/url] preset for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]CoT[/url] lvl 6 nights. I found that the original presets were not bright enough so I made my own and tought I would share it for those who don't want to put the time/don't know how to make their own. I also enhanced the flicker effect so that it is more noticeable.

This is tweaked for lvl 6 nights but works with every other level. If you want me to try and make presets for other night lvls just ask me and I might do so if I have the time.

[img]http://puu.sh/kMm2s/8d94b957c6.png[/img]

I used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20781/?]Project ENB[/url] Fantasy preset in the screenshots.

[list]
[*]Installation
[/list]Just use NMM or extract directly to Skyrim directory.

[list]
[*][size=3]Load order[/size]
[/list]Use LOOT or load it after Lanterns of Skyrim main esm

[u]Full credits to:[/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3150929/]mannygt[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916/?]Lanterns of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1402285/]jjc71[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
author: Jayssen
